alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Hickman (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 12:12PM EST until March 14 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky... Ohio River at Shawneetown. Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois...Kentucky...Missouri... Ohio River at Cairo. .Minor flooding continues along the Ohio River at Shawneetown, Olmsted Lock and Dam, and Cairo. Water levels are expected to continue a slow fall, falling below flood stage early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Cairo. * WHEN...Until late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 40.0 feet, Minor flooding occurs affecting mainly agricultural bottomland and low lying areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Saturday the stage was 43.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CST Saturday was 43.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning and continue falling to 29.6 feet by Tuesday, March 21. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
